title: Hand Script
content:

author: Giles

comments.content: Most probably [Pastiche Brush](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush) using some stylistic alternates available through OpenType features: 1st / [s](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/554331/483), 2nd / [s](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/554331/489) and 3rd / [s](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/pastiche-brush/regular/glyphs.html#glyphs/554331/487)
